caption.p: Changes in observed concurrent hot day and hot night (CHDHN) events. ( a) Average frequency of 3-day CHDHN events for the period (1951–2016), ( b) same as in ( a) but for the period 1951–1983, ( c) same as in ( a) but for the period 1984–2016, ( d) difference of ( b and c), ( e) all-India averaged frequency of 3-day CHDHN events (1951–2016), ( e) kernel density functions for ( b), and ( c) and their kolmogorov-smirnov, and rank-sum significance test. The figure was developed using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT, https://www.soest.hawaii.edu/gmt/).
